lead_paragraph: A police officer in the eastern city of Ismailia has been sentenced to eight years in jail for beating a man to death in custody.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Police Officer Is Sentenced in Beating Death
headline.main: Egypt: Police Officer Is Sentenced in Beating Death

snippet: A police officer in the eastern city of Ismailia has been sentenced to eight years in jail for beating a man to death in custody.
abstract: Egyptian court sentences police officer in Ismailia, Egypt, to eight years in jail for beating death of veterinarian while in custody, and later falsifying police records.
